diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts of Modern History.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    MH[Modern History] --> R[Renaissance]
    MH --> REF[Reformation]
    MH --> E[Age of Exploration]
    MH --> S[Scientific Revolution]
    MH --> ENL[Enlightenment]
    MH --> REV[Age of Revolutions]

    REV --> A[American Revolution]
    REV --> F[French Revolution]
    REV --> I[Industrial Revolution]
